title: Boden's 'flattering' paisley dress 'perfect for autumn'
description: Shoppers can step into the new season in style with this Boden dress
content:
Finding the ideal dress, that isn’t fussy or frumpy, that can be worn with flats and heels, and with tights or without, can be a lifelong challenge. This Ivy Smocked Midi Dress from Boden might just be a contender, though, particularly as the season shifts into autumn. Available in sizes 4 up to 22, as well as small, regular and long, depending on body size and shape, it really is a dress for all. Costing £99 full price, handily it’s possible to get 15% off the 4.5 starred outfit using a code available on the website, bringing the total down to £84.15 for savvy shoppers. Long sleeved with a deep v-neck and slightly ruched waist, it comes in a ‘French’ navy colour with red dots and looks great paired with red heeled boots (like the model) but would also look super chic with flat, brown leather sandals and a basket on holiday.

For those who aren't a fan of polka dots, there’s the Mint Velvet Navy Polo Jersey Midi Dress - Blue from Very, which is also £99. With a pleated skirt it swishes nicely, and the collar detail makes it suitable for slightly smarter occasions. For £69, Nobody’s Child has the Black Polka Dot Kennedy Midi Dress. This monochrome number is a full button down and would look great with big gold hoops and heels, or with just a denim jacket thrown over the top. One customer said of the Boden dress: "Great dress. Quite heavy jersey so will be perfect for Autumn. I love a paisley print and the pink and green colour way works well. Good fit and flattering cut." A second said: “This is such a beautiful dress! I love the 'Ivy' style because of the generous length, flattering sleeves and lowish neckline. It's so easy and comfortable to wear. The red pattern looks quite bold on the hanger but once on, it looks very attractive. I can imagine wearing it during the summer for special occasions, as well as for a smart work dress.” A third added: “Another lovely Boden dress in bold colours. Pattern and style you won't find anywhere else at an affordable price. Very comfy and flattering.” However, one said: “My absolute favourite dress! Wish it had been available in the petite size, since petite fitted me better (I order several prints), however regular size is OK.” Another flagged: “Nice dress, quality fabric and fit. I only buy Boden dresses when they're available in long/tall, as the regular fit is too short all over for me (I'm 5-8). I had to adjust the neck-line a little as it was too low for my taste - buttons would be better, Boden, so we have a choice. I wore it to the races, and it was just the thing!” The Ivy Smocked Midi Dress is available at Boden.
summary: Boden's Ivy Smocked Midi Dress, priced at £99 and available in sizes 4 up to 22, is available in various sizes depending on body size and shape. It is possible to get 15% off the outfit using a code available on the website, bringing the total to £84.15. The dress comes in a ‘French’ navy colour with red dots and would look great paired with red heeled boots and sandals on holiday. For non-pennish, there are also options from Very, with a full button down dress and a Black Polka Dot Kennedy Midi dress.
shortSummary: Boden’s Ivy Smocked Midi Dress, priced at £99, offers flattering, comfortable options for all sizes and fits, ideal for autumn.

The long and short of it
Unlike many brands, at Boden we know that ‘petite’ sizing (designed for customers 5ft 3in or under) isn’t just about trimming a bit off the hem. Instead, we’ve proportionally shortened the length throughout on these garments – not just at the knee or ankle – so that they fit and flatter all over. You’ll notice the difference when you try them on.
In jumpsuits we also offer a ‘tall’ size for customers 5ft 10in or over. We’ve not just added extra fabric to the legs but increased the length proportionately throughout the style to ensure a noticeably improved, flattering fit.
For our ‘long’ styles, we’ve added extra length at the bottom, so you can choose where you’d like the hemline to fall and whether you’d like to wear the garment with flats or (hooray) heels.

argos_summary: The article highlights the Boden Ivy Smocked Midi Dress as a versatile, autumn‑ready option available in a range of sizes and at £99, with a 15% discount code reducing the price to £84.15. It describes the dress’s navy color with red polka dots, long sleeves, V‑neck, and ruched waist, noting its suitability for both flats and heels and its heavy jersey fabric ideal for cooler weather. Customer reviews praise its flattering fit, comfort, and unique print, while some note sizing issues for petite or tall customers, reflecting Boden’s detailed sizing strategy. The piece also briefly mentions comparable options such as Very’s Mint Velvet Navy Polo Jersey Midi Dress and Nobody’s Child’s Black Polka Dot Kennedy Midi Dress, offering alternative styles and price points.
